name: marathon-autoscaler
description: A container autoscaler for Mesos and DCOS.
preInstallNotes: We recommend a minimum of one node with at least 0.1 CPU shares and 128MB of RAM available for the Marathon Autoscaler DCOS Service.
postInstallNotes:
Marathon DCOS Service has been successfully installed!

	Documentation: https://docs.mesosphere.com/1.12/tutorials/autoscaling/cpu-memory/
postUninstallNotes: The Marathon Autoscaler DCOS Service has been uninstalled and will no longer run.
